data.text: @Surabhi25021990 Surabhi, please note we don't accept pets on board. We're accepting only dogs (via cargo). For further details, please get in touch with our team at cargocare@spicejet.com.
@samarpa16826866 It's the passenger's responsibility to report at the counter before the counter closure. If a passenger reports late at the counter, he/she is considered no show for the flight.

@samarpa16826866 As informed via DM, we try our best to accommodate as many passengers as we can but a passenger is denied only when it is beyond the control of the airline to accept the passenger once the counter is closed.
